remarks: Distribution of class substitution over conjunction.  (Contributed by NM, 21-May-2004.)  Obsolete as of 17-Aug-2018.  Use ~ sbcan instead. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: sbcangOLD $p |- ( A e. V -> ( [. A / x ]. ( ph /\ ps ) <-> ( [. A / x ]. ph /\ [. A / x ]. ps ) ) ) $.
